argument.name: imagedata
argument.description: An image read into a blob variable.

page.discussion: The A5_IMAGE_TRANSFORM() function displays the Image Transform dialog box. This utility allows you to scale, crop or rotate 8 bit Window Bitmap (.BMP) or JPEG images.
page.example: b1 = file.to_blob("C:\Documents and Settings\ELarrabee\Desktop\alpha8.bmp") b2 = a5_image_transform(b1)
